summary: An ordinance relating to and amending Plat 66W & 31W page 159 & 93, of the Official Zoning Map of the City of Seattle, Ordinance 86300, to rezone certain property in Lots 1-20 incl., Block 19, Hillman City Div. No. 2, and portions of Lots 4, 5, 6 and 12, Block 8, Union City Add. lying northeasterly of E. Montlake Pl.
